summary: Completed testing of documentation pages and team management role change API. All features working correctly - Documentation hub shows all guide cards, individual documentation pages (Strategic Profiles, Approval Workflow, Social Accounts) load with full content, and role change API works for admin users.
passed_tests: Demo admin login successful with correct role
Database health check returns healthy status
Team management list members API returns correct data
Role change API endpoint exists and responds correctly
Role change validation rejects invalid roles
Role change prevents admin from changing own role
Team invitation validation rejects invalid roles
Documentation hub shows all guide cards: What's New, About & Best Practices, Workflows & Scoring Guide, Teams & Roles, Strategic Profiles, Approval Workflow, Social Accounts, Admin Guide, User Guide
Strategic Profiles documentation page at /contentry/documentation/profiles loads with full content
Approval Workflow documentation page at /contentry/documentation/approval loads with full content
Social Accounts documentation page at /contentry/documentation/social loads with full content
No duplicate Team Management link in sidebar - Administration section only shows Documentation
Team Members table displays correctly with member info, roles, and status
Role change API PUT /api/v1/team-management/members/{member_id}/role works for admin users
Role change persists correctly in database (verified with GET after PUT)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing demo-admin account and test-member-001
context_for_next_testing_agent: All documentation pages verified working. Role change API fixed and working correctly - the fix was in team.py where 'http_request' parameter was renamed to 'request' for the authorization decorator, and db_conn was properly passed to get_user_role() and create_notification() functions. Team Management accessible via Settings > Team route.
